title: Ping doubles every other game
body: When the servers were moved to the Midwest, I consistently had 12 ping. After the first patch this season, my ping went up ( it still stays static every game), but the first game I play will have 49 ping, the second game will have 27, and that then repeats for however many games I play, back and forth. Nothing  has changed with my connection, firewall, etc. since that first patch, but it follows that pattern like clock work. What could be causing that?

replies.body:
What you're experiencing is most likely caused by an inconsistent or unreliable route to our servers. To find out specifically where the issue is happening, we'll first need to ensure your local network settings are 100% compatible with our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) before we can look at your route.

Please let me know if those steps caused any changes to your latency.
